DataElement.preferredName: Imaging Technique Observation Performed Study Activity Enhance Description ISO21090.ST.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The textual representation for how an image is enhanced either physically or electronically.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Imaging Technique Observation Performed Study Activity Enhance Description
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective._To improve the quality of something; make better or more attractive.:A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Imaging Technique Observation Performed Study Activity
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective.

Concepts.definition: Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.
Executed and carried through to completion.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: To improve the quality of something; make better or more attractive.:A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

Concepts.definition: To improve the quality of something; make better or more attractive.
A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Character string datatype stands for text data.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
